title: Udemy
description: Udemy is a popular online learning platform that offers a wide variety of courses on IT and software, among other topics. It does offer some free courses, the majority of its courses are paid.

title: FreeCodeCamp
description: FreeCodeCamp is a non-profit organization that provides free online courses in web development and other programming-related topics. The courses are project-based, meaning you'll work on real-world projects, which helps to build practical skills.

title: Udacity
description: Udacity is an online learning platform that offers courses, nanodegrees, and other educational programs It offers both free and paid courses.

title: KhanAcademy
description: Khan Academy is a non-profit educational organization that provides free online courses in a wide range of subjects, including computer science and programming. Khan Academy is a free online learning platform.

title: The Odin Project
description: The Odin Project is a free, open-source curriculum for learning web development. It is designed to be a comprehensive and hands-on guide for anyone who wants to learn how to build websites and web applications.

title: Coursera
description: Coursera is an online learning platform that offers  a variety of web development courses, ranging from beginner to advanced levels. Coursera also offers certificate programs and degree programs.
